body_html:
A natively GPU version of dynamic_stitch looks doable to me (not fundamentally harder than scatter or gather), so I'll mark this contributions welcome.

I'm happy to provide tips if someone wants to take this on.

body:
A natively GPU version of `dynamic_stitch` looks doable to me (not fundamentally harder than scatter or gather), so I'll mark this contributions welcome.

I'm happy to provide tips if someone wants to take this on.
